00011 //Don't want time to be synchronized. Need to check load imbalance.

00118   if(runOpt == 1 || runOpt == 2)  {
00119     if(readPtsFile) {
00120       if(!rank){
00121         std::cout << " reading  "<<p2nOut<<std::endl; // Point size
00122       }
00123       ot::readPtsFromFile(p2nOut, pts);
00124       if(!rank){
00125         std::cout << " finished reading  "<<p2nOut<<std::endl; // Point size
00126       }
00127       ptsLen = pts.size();
00128       std::vector<ot::TreeNode> tmpNodes;
00129       for(int i=0;i<ptsLen;i+=3) {
00130         if( (pts[i] > 0.0) &&
00131                  (pts[i+1] > 0.0)  
00132                 && (pts[i+2] > 0.0) &&
00133               ( ((unsigned int)(pts[i]*((double)(1u << maxDepth)))) < (1u << maxDepth))  &&
00134               ( ((unsigned int)(pts[i+1]*((double)(1u << maxDepth)))) < (1u << maxDepth))  &&
00135               ( ((unsigned int)(pts[i+2]*((double)(1u << maxDepth)))) < (1u << maxDepth)) ) {
00136         tmpNodes.push_back( ot::TreeNode((unsigned int)(pts[i]*(double)(1u << maxDepth)),
00137             (unsigned int)(pts[i+1]*(double)(1u << maxDepth)),
00138             (unsigned int)(pts[i+2]*(double)(1u << maxDepth)),
00139             maxDepth,dim,maxDepth) );
00140         }
00141       }
00142       pts.clear();
00143     //  std::cout<<"Before Removing Duplicates, the number of pts: "<<tmpNodes.size()<<std::endl; 
00144       par::removeDuplicates<ot::TreeNode>(tmpNodes,false,MPI_COMM_WORLD);       
00145      // std::cout<<"After Removing Duplicates, the number of pts: "<<tmpNodes.size()<<std::endl; 
00146       nodes = tmpNodes;
00147       tmpNodes.clear();
00148       par::partitionW<ot::TreeNode>(nodes, NULL,MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00149       // reduce and only print the total ...
00150       DendroIntL locSz, totalSz;
00151       locSz = nodes.size();
00152 
00153       par::Mpi_Reduce<DendroIntL>(&locSz, &totalSz, 1, MPI_SUM, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00154       
00155       if(rank==0) {

00157       }
00158 
00159       pts.resize(3*(nodes.size()));

00161       for(int i=0;i<nodes.size();i++) {
00162         pts[3*i] = (((double)(nodes[i].getX())) + 0.5)/((double)(1u << maxDepth));
00163         pts[(3*i)+1] = (((double)(nodes[i].getY())) +0.5)/((double)(1u << maxDepth));
00164         pts[(3*i)+2] = (((double)(nodes[i].getZ())) +0.5)/((double)(1u << maxDepth));
00165       }//end for i
00166       nodes.clear();
00167     }
00168     gSize[0] = 1.;
00169     gSize[1] = 1.;
00170    gSize[2] = 1.;
00171     if(writePOut) { 
00172       ot::writePtsToFile(p2nOut,pts);
00173     }
00174  #ifdef PETSC_USE_LOG
00175   PetscLogStagePop();
00176 #endif
00177     MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);        
00178 #ifdef PETSC_USE_LOG
00179   PetscLogStagePush(stages[1]);
00180 #endif
00181     startTime = MPI_Wtime();
00182     ot::points2Octree(pts, gSize, nodes, dim, maxDepth, maxNumPts, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00183     endTime = MPI_Wtime();
00184 #ifdef PETSC_USE_LOG
00185   PetscLogStagePop();
00186 #endif
00187     double locTime, totalTime, minTime;
00188     locTime = endTime - startTime;
00189     par::Mpi_Reduce<double>(&locTime, &totalTime, 1, MPI_MAX, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00190     par::Mpi_Reduce<double>(&locTime, &minTime, 1, MPI_MIN, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00191     if(!rank){
00192       std::cout <<"P2n Time: "<<totalTime << " " << "secs imbalance: "<< totalTime/minTime << std::endl;
00193     }
00194     pts.clear();
00195   }
00196   //TestBuildOCt from here on:
00197   if(runOpt == 0 || runOpt == 2) {
00198     if(readOctFile) {
00199       ot::readNodesFromFile(n2oOut,nodes);
00200     }
00201     std::vector<ot::TreeNode > linOct;  
00202 #ifdef PETSC_USE_LOG
00203   PetscLogStagePush(stages[2]);
00204 #endif
00205     DendroIntL inputNodes = nodes.size();
00206     DendroIntL totInp;
00207     par::Mpi_Reduce<DendroIntL>(&inputNodes, &totInp, 1, MPI_SUM, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00208     if(!rank) {
00209       std::cout << "Nodes after p2o: "<< totInp  << std::endl;       
00210     }
00211     ot::completeOctree(nodes,linOct,dim,maxDepth,false, false, false, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00212 #ifdef PETSC_USE_LOG
00213   PetscLogStagePop();
00214 #endif
00215 
00216     assert(!linOct.empty());
00217     if(writeBOut) { 
00218       ot::writeNodesToFile(n2oOut,linOct);
00219     }
00220     inputNodes = linOct.size();
00221     nodes.clear();
00222     std::vector<ot::TreeNode > balOct;
00223 
00224     par::Mpi_Reduce<DendroIntL>(&inputNodes, &totInp, 1, MPI_SUM, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00225     if(!rank) {
00226       std::cout << "Nodes before balancing: "<< totInp  << std::endl;       
00227     }
00228 
00229     balOct = linOct;
00230     linOct.clear();
00231 
00232     MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);        
00233 #ifdef PETSC_USE_LOG
00234   PetscLogStagePush(stages[3]);
00235 #endif
00236   startTime = MPI_Wtime();
00237   if(rippleType == 1) {
00238     if(!rank) {
00239       std::cout<<"Type -1 ripple."<<std::endl;
00240     }
00241       ot::parallelRippleType1(balOct,incCorner,checkBailOut,rePart,dim, maxDepth, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00242   }else if(rippleType == 2) {
00243     if(!rank) {
00244       std::cout<<"Type -2 ripple."<<std::endl;
00245     }
00246       ot::parallelRippleType2(balOct,incCorner,checkBailOut,rePart,dim, maxDepth, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00247   }else {
00248     if(!rank) {
00249       std::cout<<"Type -3 ripple."<<std::endl;
00250     }
00251       ot::parallelRippleType3(balOct,incCorner,checkBailOut,rePart,dim, maxDepth, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00252   }
00253   endTime = MPI_Wtime();
00254 #ifdef PETSC_USE_LOG
00255   PetscLogStagePop();
00256 #endif
00257     assert(!balOct.empty());
00258     if(writeBOut) { 
00259       ot::writeNodesToFile(balOut,balOct);
00260     }
00261     // compute total inp size and output size
00262     DendroIntL locBalNodes = balOct.size();
00263     DendroIntL totBal;
00264     double balTime, totTime;
00265     balTime = endTime - startTime;
00266     par::Mpi_Reduce<DendroIntL>(&locBalNodes, &totBal, 1, MPI_SUM, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00267     par::Mpi_Reduce<double>(&balTime, &totTime, 1, MPI_MAX, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00268     par::Mpi_Reduce<double>(&balTime, &minTime, 1, MPI_MIN, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00269 
00270     if(!rank) {
00271       std::cout << "Nodes after balancing: "<< totBal << std::endl;       
00272       std::cout << "bal Time: "<<totTime << " " << "secs imbalance: "<< totTime/minTime << std::endl;
00273     }
00274 
00275     balOct.clear();
00276   }
00277   PetscFinalize();
00278 }
